Description: 6 procedurally generated 1v1 arenas at the same time, with matchmaking to put you with players of your skill. Enable and disable heroes to your liking.
HideMenu: To hide this explanation press voice line down.
HeroSelect: To enable and disable heroes press interact to open the menu and ultimate to toggle.
KDR: Players are sorted by KDR, the higher your KDR, the higher your arena.
Name: 6 1v1 Arenas
